info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 18 at 1:07PM CST until December 18 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN NEWTON COUNTY... At 106 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Newton to near Buna, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newton, Wrights Settlement, Old Salem, Trout Creek, Stringtown and Bleakwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
